data.comment: Today's referee, Manuel Grafe, has blown to start the match.
Mainz have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Mainz advance rapidly upfield but Manuel Grafe blows for offside.
Mainz push upfield but Manuel Grafe quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick for Leipzig in their own half.
In the minute 4, Dani Olmo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leipzig.
Corner awarded to Leipzig.
In Leipzig Leipzig attack through Lukas Klostermann. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 5, Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
Can Leipzig get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
In the minute 7, Can Leipzig capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Marcel Halstenberg's header is off-target for Leipzig.
Goal kick for Mainz at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 9, Manuel Grafe signals a Leipzig throw-in in Mainz's half.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead thanks to a penalty from Emil Forsberg.
Manuel Grafe blows against Mainz's Jean-Philippe Mateta for offside.
In the minute 21, Goal! Leipzig increase their lead to 2-0 through a well-placed header from Yussuf Poulsen.
That's a fine assist from Dani Olmo.
Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
In the minute 24, Manuel Grafe awards Mainz a goal kick.
At Red Bull Arena, Leipzig are penalized for being offside.
Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 26, Mainz push forward at Red Bull Arena and Jonathan Michael Burkardt gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Leipzig defence.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
Mainz's Jonathan Michael Burkardt gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Leipzig defender.
In the minute 27, Mainz have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
Mainz's Daniel Brosinski misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leipzig.
In the minute 29, Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
Leipzig drives forward and Yussuf Poulsen gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Leipzig a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 30, Jean-Philippe Mateta (Mainz) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
So close for Leipzig as Emil Forsberg's shot comes back off the post.
In the minute 31, Dani Olmo (Leipzig) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Leipzig's Emil Forsberg breaks free at Red Bull Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
In the minute 33, Manuel Grafe awards the home team a throw-in.
Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Leipzig.
Mainz have a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Throw-in Mainz.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Leipzig capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Mainz's half?
In the minute 39, Free kick Leipzig.
Emil Forsberg for Leipzig gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Mainz at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Leipzig in the half of Mainz.
Angelino (Leipzig) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Leipzig.
In the minute 45, Leipzig to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
Angelino for Leipzig drives towards goal at Red Bull Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Red Bull Arena.
The second half has started at Red Bull Arena.
Throw-in for Leipzig at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 48, Jean-Philippe Mateta puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
Great play from Robin Quaison to set up the goal.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Leipzig in the half of Mainz.
Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
It's now 3-1 in Leipzig as Amadou Haidara scores for Leipzig.
In the minute 51, Emil Forsberg instrumental with a fine assist.
In Leipzig a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Leipzig are coming forward and Kevin Kampl gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 54, Manuel Grafe awards Mainz a goal kick.
Leipzig pushes forward through Dani Olmo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Leipzig.
In the minute 57, Emil Forsberg (Leipzig) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Lukas Klostermann of Leipzig gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leipzig.
In the minute 58, Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Danny Latza (Mainz) has received a first yellow card.
Manuel Grafe awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Free kick Leipzig.
Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Karim Onisiwo.
Mainz's Karim Onisiwo is back in action after a slight knock.
Kevin Kampl has recovered and rejoins the match in Leipzig.
In the minute 63, Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Manuel Grafe waits before resuming play because Kevin Kampl for Leipzig is still down.
Yussuf Poulsen of Leipzig smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 64, Mainz needs to be cautious. Leipzig have an attacking throw-in.
Leipzig's Yussuf Poulsen has been booked in Leipzig.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Leipzig close to the penalty box.
Dani Olmo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 66, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Emil Forsberg for Leipzig who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Emil Forsberg for Leipzig is back on the field again.
Leipzig's Yussuf Poulsen is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 67, Throw-in high up the field for Mainz in Leipzig.
Jean-Paul Boetius is replacing Robin Quaison for Mainz at Red Bull Arena.
Mainz make their first substitution with Levin Oztunali replacing Jonathan Michael Burkardt.
In the minute 69, The home team has substituted Dani Olmo with Hee-chan Hwang. Julian Nagelsmann is thus making his first change.
Manuel Grafe signals a throw-in for Mainz, close to Leipzig's area.
Free kick for Mainz in the half of Leipzig.
In the minute 73, Mainz's Daniel Brosinski gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Leipzig at Red Bull Arena.
Throw-in Mainz.
In the minute 76, Mainz have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
In Leipzig Mainz drive forward through Danny Latza. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
In the minute 77, Jean-Philippe Mateta (Mainz) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Leipzig goal kick.
Julian Nagelsmann (Leipzig) has taken off Kevin Kampl who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Benjamin Henrichs is the replacement.
In the minute 77, Christopher Nkunku (Leipzig) has replaced the possibly injured Emil Forsberg at Red Bull Arena.
Leipzig's Angelino is on target but unsuccessful.
Leipzig have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 79, Free kick in a good position for Leipzig!
Leipzig pushes forward through Christopher Nkunku, whose finish on goal is saved.
Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
In the minute 80, Yussuf Poulsen (Leipzig) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leipzig.
Leipzig's Yussuf Poulsen gets in a shot on goal at Red Bull Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Mainz at Red Bull Arena.
The away team have replaced Danny Latza with Niklas Tauer. This is the third substitution made today by Achim Beierlorzer.
Achim Beierlorzer is making the team's fourth substitution at Red Bull Arena with Issah Abass replacing Karim Onisiwo.
Ball safe as Leipzig is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mainz are in shooting range from this free kick.
Jeremiah St. Juste (Mainz) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Leipzig have a goal kick.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Leipzig.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-1.
Paul Nebel is on a sub for Jean-Philippe Mateta for Mainz.
The home team replace Amadou Haidara with Nordi Mukiele.
